languages.text: "Впрочем, кровь в твоих жилах шепчет духам о том, что ты стоишь чуть большего внимания. Хм... да... ты — потомок Вольного Торговца, чей {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патент{/g} был целью Кунрада Войгтвира. Осквернив святыню и связав себя с ней узами Эмпиреев, он должен был стать моим слугой, Вольным Торговцем на службе Истины... но ты помешал{mf||а} ему. Быть может, ты хочешь получить благоволение истинных богов? Желаешь ли сам{mf||а} преподнести мне святыню своего ложного бога и послужить Истине? Самая твоя кровь взывает в тебе, моля подчиниться мне — к чему же напрасное сопротивление?"

traits.locale_text: "Вольный Торговец мертва — я знаю об этом, ибо ее смерть засвидетельствовал Кунрад Войгтвир. Прискорбно, что он так и не выполнил свое предназначение — доставить мне Патент, отмеченный кровью священного трупа. Быть может, ты прибыл{mf||а} для того, чтобы исправить его ошибку? Лично приподнести мне свое главное сокровище?"

languages.text: "Nevertheless, the blood in your veins whispers to the spirits that you warrant a closer look. Hmm... Yes... You are a descendant of the Rogue Trader whose {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Kunrad Voigtvir sought to obtain. By defiling the relic and binding it to himself with the tethers of the Empyrean, he was meant to become my servant, a Rogue Trader who would do the work of the Truth... but then you interfered. Could it be that you wish to gain the true gods' favour instead? Do you wish to present the corpse's relic to me and serve the Truth? Hear your very blood calling, begging you to submit to me — what would be the point of futile defiance?"
languages.original_text: "Впрочем, кровь в твоих жилах шепчет духам о том, что ты стоишь чуть большего внимания. Хм... да... ты — потомок Вольного Торговца, чей {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патент{/g} был целью Кунрада Войгтвира. Осквернив святыню и связав себя с ней узами Эмпиреев, он должен был стать моим слугой, Вольным Торговцем на службе Истины... но ты помешал{mf||а} ему. Быть может, ты хочешь получить благоволение истинных богов? Желаешь ли сам{mf||а} преподнести мне святыню своего ложного бога и послужить Истине? Самая твоя кровь взывает в тебе, моля подчиниться мне — к чему же напрасное сопротивление?"

traits.locale_text: "Nevertheless, the blood in your veins whispers to the spirits that you warrant a slightly greater deal of attention. Hmm... Yes... You are a descendant of the Rogue Trader whose {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Kunrad Voigtvir was supposed to deliver to me. That worm failed at his task... because of you. He lost my favour. Could it be that you want to gain it instead? Do you wish to present your false god's relic to me and serve the Truth? Your very blood calls for you to serve the one whom your kind, in its blindness, calls the Archenemy — then what would be the point of futile defiance?"

You are a descendant of the Rogue Trader whose {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Kunrad Voigtvir was supposed to deliver to me. That worm failed at his task... because of you. He lost my favour. Could it be that you want to gain it instead? Do you wish to present your false god's relic to me and serve the Truth? Your very blood calls for you to serve the one whom your kind, in its blindness, calls the Archenemy — then what would be the point of futile defiance?"

You are a descendant of the Rogue Trader whose {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Kunrad Voigtvir sought to obtain. By defiling the relic and binding it to himself with the tethers of the Empyrean, he was meant to become my servant, a Rogue Trader who would do the work of the Truth... but then you interfered. Could it be that you wish to gain the true gods' favour instead? Do you wish to present the corpse's relic to me and serve the Truth? Hear your very blood calling, begging you to submit to me — what would be the point of futile defiance?"

Could it be that you wish to gain it instead? Do you wish to present your false god's relic to me and serve the Truth? Your very blood calls for you to serve the one whom your kind, in its blindness, calls the Archenemy — what would be the point of such futile defiance?"

"Nevertheless, the blood in your veins whispers to the spirits that you warrant a closer look. Hmm... Yes... You are a descendant of the Rogue Trader whose {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Kunrad Voigtvir was supposed to deliver to me. That worm failed at his task... because of you. He lost my favour. Could it be that you wish to gain it instead? Do you wish to present your false god's relic to me and serve the Truth? Your very blood calls for you to serve the one whom your kind, in its blindness, calls the Archenemy — what would be the point of futile defiance?"

"Nevertheless, the blood in your veins whispers to the spirits that you warrant a closer look. Hmm... Yes... You are a descendant of the Rogue Trader whose {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Kunrad Voigtvir sought to obtain. By defiling the relic and binding it to himself with the tethers of the Empyrean, he was meant to become my servant, a Rogue Trader who would do the work of the Truth... but then you interfered. Could it be that you wish to gain the true gods' favour instead? Do you wish to present the corpse's relic to me and serve the Truth? Hear your very blood calling, begging you to submit to me — what would be the point of futile defiance?"

"Nevertheless, the blood in your veins whispers to the spirits that you warrant a closer look. Hmm... Yes... You are a descendant of the Rogue Trader whose {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Kunrad Voigtvir sought to obtain. By defiling the relic and binding it to himself with the tethers of the Empyrean, he was meant to become my servant, a Rogue Trader who would do the work of the Truth... but then you interfered. Could it be that you wish to gain the true gods' favour instead? Do you wish to present the corpse's relic to me and serve the Truth? Hear your very blood calling, begging you to submit to me — what would be the point of futile defiance?"

languages.text: «Sin embargo, la sangre de tus venas indica a los espíritus que mereces un poco más de atención. Mmm... Sí... Eres descendiente de la Comerciante Independiente cuya {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g} anhelaba Kunrad Voigtvir. Debía profanar la reliquia y vincularla a su persona con las ataduras del Empíreo y convertirse en mi sirviente, en un Comerciante Independiente que cumpliera con la labor de la Verdad... pero tu interferencia lo impidió. ¿Acaso buscas obtener tú el favor de los Dioses Verdaderos? ¿Quieres entregarme la reliquia de tu falso dios y servir a la Verdad? Escucha la llamada de tu misma sangre, rogándote que te sometas a mí... ¿por qué resistirte inútilmente?».
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless, the blood in your veins whispers to the spirits that you warrant a closer look. Hmm... Yes... You are a descendant of the Rogue Trader whose {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Kunrad Voigtvir sought to obtain. By defiling the relic and binding it to himself with the tethers of the Empyrean, he was meant to become my servant, a Rogue Trader who would do the work of the Truth... but then you interfered. Could it be that you wish to gain the true gods' favour instead? Do you wish to present the corpse's relic to me and serve the Truth? Hear your very blood calling, begging you to submit to me — what would be the point of futile defiance?"

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, la sangre de tus venas indica a los espíritus que mereces un poco más de atención. Mmm... Sí... Eres descendiente de la Comerciante Independiente cuya {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g} debía traerme Kunrad Voigtvir. Ese gusano falló en su labor... por tu culpa. Ha perdido mi favor. ¿Acaso buscas recibirlo en su lugar? ¿Quieres entregarme la reliquia de tu falso dios y servir a la Verdad? La sangre que recorre tus venas exige que sirvas a lo que tu gente, en su infinita ceguera, llama el Archienemigo. ¿Por qué resistirte inútilmente?».

languages.text: 「とはいえ、お前の血管に流れる血に気をつけろと精霊達は囁いている。ふむ…そうだな…お前はクンラッド・ボイトヴィルが私に届けるはずだった{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}を所有する自由開拓者の子孫だ。遺物を汚し、エンピリアンの鎖で遺物を己の体に縛り付け、奴は我が従者、真実の仕事人たる自由開拓者になるはずだった…しかし、お前が割って入ったわけだ。代わりに真の神の庇護を受けたいのか？亡き者の遺物を差し出して、真実に奉仕するつもりか？私に服従せよと泣いて頼む、その血の叫びに耳を傾けよ…無駄に抗って何の意味がある？」
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless, the blood in your veins whispers to the spirits that you warrant a closer look. Hmm... Yes... You are a descendant of the Rogue Trader whose {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Kunrad Voigtvir sought to obtain. By defiling the relic and binding it to himself with the tethers of the Empyrean, he was meant to become my servant, a Rogue Trader who would do the work of the Truth... but then you interfered. Could it be that you wish to gain the true gods' favour instead? Do you wish to present the corpse's relic to me and serve the Truth? Hear your very blood calling, begging you to submit to me — what would be the point of futile defiance?"

traits.locale_text: 「とはいえ、お前の血管に流れる血に気をつけろと精霊達は囁いている。ふむ…そうだな…お前はクンラッド・ボイトヴィルが私に届けるはずだった{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}を所有する自由開拓者の子孫だ。遺物を汚し、エンピリアンの鎖で遺物を己の体に縛り付け、奴は我が従者、真実の仕事人たる自由開拓者になるはずだった…しかし、お前が割って入ったわけだ。代わりに真の神の庇護を受けたいのか？亡き者の遺物を差し出して、真実に奉仕するつもりか？私に服従せよと泣いて頼む、その血の叫びに耳を傾けよ…無駄に抗って何の意味がある？」

languages.text: “话虽如此，你的血脉仍在向那些灵魂低语，说你这个人值得多加关注。嗯……没错……你是那个行商浪人的后代。昆拉德·维特威尔本该得到她的{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}贸易授状{/g}才对。他本该亵渎那件圣物，通过至高天的力量将它据为己有，由此成为我的仆人，成为侍奉真理的行商浪人……可你却插手了。莫非你打算寻得真神的青睐吗？你是否愿意把尸皇的遗物献给我，为真理服务？我听到了你的血脉在呼唤你，乞求你臣服于我。既然如此，你这种徒劳的反抗，又有什么意义呢？”
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless, the blood in your veins whispers to the spirits that you warrant a closer look. Hmm... Yes... You are a descendant of the Rogue Trader whose {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Kunrad Voigtvir sought to obtain. By defiling the relic and binding it to himself with the tethers of the Empyrean, he was meant to become my servant, a Rogue Trader who would do the work of the Truth... but then you interfered. Could it be that you wish to gain the true gods' favour instead? Do you wish to present the corpse's relic to me and serve the Truth? Hear your very blood calling, begging you to submit to me — what would be the point of futile defiance?"

traits.locale_text: “话虽如此，你的血脉仍在向那些灵魂低语，你的贸易许可证值得多加关注。嗯……没错……你是那个行商浪人的后代。昆拉德·维特威尔本该将她的{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}贸易许可证{/g}献给我，可那条臭虫没能完成他的任务……都是因为你。他失去了我的青睐，你打算取而代之吗？你是否愿意把你那个伪神的遗物献给我，侍奉原初真理？你的血脉正在呼唤你，要你侍奉那些被你的族群称为‘混沌大敌’的存在。既然如此，你这种徒劳的反抗，又有什么意义呢？”

languages.text: « Pour autant, le sang qui coule dans vos veines murmure aux esprits, et il semblerait que vous soyez digne de notre intérêt. Hmm... Je vois... Ainsi, vous êtes {mf|le descendant|la descendante} de la libre-marchande dont Kunrad Voigtvir convoitait la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g}. En profanant la relique et en se l'attachant par les liens de l'Empyrée, il était censé devenir mon agent, un libre-marchand qui aurait œuvré au service de la Vérité, mais... vous l'en avez empêché. Se pourrait-il que vous cherchiez à le supplanter dans la faveur des vrais dieux ? Me présenterez-vous la relique du cadavre afin d'embrasser la Vérité ? Répondez à l'appel de votre sang qui vous invite à vous soumettre à ma volonté... À quoi bon lutter futilement contre la destinée ? »
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless, the blood in your veins whispers to the spirits that you warrant a closer look. Hmm... Yes... You are a descendant of the Rogue Trader whose {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Kunrad Voigtvir sought to obtain. By defiling the relic and binding it to himself with the tethers of the Empyrean, he was meant to become my servant, a Rogue Trader who would do the work of the Truth... but then you interfered. Could it be that you wish to gain the true gods' favour instead? Do you wish to present the corpse's relic to me and serve the Truth? Hear your very blood calling, begging you to submit to me — what would be the point of futile defiance?"

traits.locale_text: « Pour autant, le sang qui coule dans vos veines murmure aux esprits, et il semblerait que vous présentiez un quelconque intérêt. Hmm... Je vois... Ainsi, vous êtes {mf|le descendant|la descendante} de la libre-marchande dont la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} devait m'être remise par Kunrad Voigtvir. Ce misérable vermisseau a échoué... à cause de vous. Il ne trouve plus grâce à mes yeux, mais peut-être cherchez-vous à prendre sa place ? Me présenterez-vous la relique de votre faux dieu afin d'embrasser la Vérité ? Après tout, votre lignée vous impose de servir celui que votre espèce, dans son aveuglement, appelle le Grand Ennemi. À quoi lutter futilement contre votre sort ? »

languages.text: "Nichtsdestotrotz flüstert das Blut in Euren Venen zu den Geistern, dass Ihr etwas mehr Aufmerksamkeit verdient habt. Hmm ... Ja ... Ihr seid {mf|ein Nachfahr|eine Nachfahrin} der Freihändlerin, deren {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g} Kunrad Voigtvir an sich bringen wollte. Als er das Relikt entweiht und mithilfe des Empyreums an sich gebunden hat, stand fest, dass er mein Diener werden würde, ein Freihändler, der die Arbeit der Wahrheit verrichtet ... aber dann habt Ihr Euch eingemischt. Kann es sein, dass stattdessen Ihr die Gunst der Götter erlangen wollt? Wollt Ihr mir das Relikt des Leichnams übergeben und der Wahrheit dienen? Ich höre Euer Blut rufen, es fleht Euch an, Euch mir zu unterwerfen ... welchen Nutzen hätte Euer zweckloser Widerstand?"
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless, the blood in your veins whispers to the spirits that you warrant a closer look. Hmm... Yes... You are a descendant of the Rogue Trader whose {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Kunrad Voigtvir sought to obtain. By defiling the relic and binding it to himself with the tethers of the Empyrean, he was meant to become my servant, a Rogue Trader who would do the work of the Truth... but then you interfered. Could it be that you wish to gain the true gods' favour instead? Do you wish to present the corpse's relic to me and serve the Truth? Hear your very blood calling, begging you to submit to me — what would be the point of futile defiance?"

traits.locale_text: "Dennoch, das Blut in Euren Venen flüstert zu den Geistern, dass Ihr etwas mehr Aufmerksamkeit verdient habt. Hmm ... Ja ... Ihr stammt von der Freihändlerin ab, deren {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g} Kunrad Voigtvir mir bringen sollte. Dieser Wurm ist an seiner Aufgabe gescheitert ... Euretwegen. Er hat meine Gunst verloren. Möchtet Ihr sie vielleicht stattdessen gewinnen? Möchtet Ihr mir das Relikt Eures falschen Gottes überreichen und der Wahrheit dienen? Das Blut in Euren Adern verlangt, dass Ihr jenem dient, den Euer Volk in seiner Blindheit den Erzfeind nennt. Welchen Sinn hätte dieser vergebliche Widerstand?"

languages.text: "Öte yandan damarlarında akan kan, ruhlara dikkate değer biri olduğunu söylüyor. Hımm... Evet... {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatnamesini{/g} Kunrad Voigtvir'in arzuladığı Hür Tacir'in soyundansın. Voigtvir, yadigârı lekeleyip Gök Diyar'ın zincirleriyle kendine bağlayarak benim kulum olacaktı. Hakikat'e hizmet edecek bir Hür Tacir... Fakat araya sen girdin. Acaba gerçek tanrıların gözüne mi girmeye çalışıyorsun? Cesedin yadigârını bana teslim edip Hakikat'e mi hizmet edeceksin? Kendi kanın bile bana diz çökmen için yalvarıyor, duymuyor musun? Boş yere direnmenin manası ne?"
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless, the blood in your veins whispers to the spirits that you warrant a closer look. Hmm... Yes... You are a descendant of the Rogue Trader whose {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Kunrad Voigtvir sought to obtain. By defiling the relic and binding it to himself with the tethers of the Empyrean, he was meant to become my servant, a Rogue Trader who would do the work of the Truth... but then you interfered. Could it be that you wish to gain the true gods' favour instead? Do you wish to present the corpse's relic to me and serve the Truth? Hear your very blood calling, begging you to submit to me — what would be the point of futile defiance?"

traits.locale_text: “Öte yandan damarlarında akan kan, ruhlara dikkate değer biri olduğunu söylüyor. Hımm... Evet... {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g}’sini Kunrad Voigtvir’in arzuladığı Hür Tacir’in soyundansın. Voigtvir, yadigârı lekeleyip Gök Diyar’ın zincirleriyle kendine bağlayarak benim kulum olacaktı. Hakikat’e hizmet edecek bir Hür Tacir... Fakat araya sen girdin. Acaba gerçek tanrıların gözüne mi girmeye çalışıyorsun? Cesedin yadigârını bana teslim edip Hakikat’e mi hizmet edeceksin? Duymuyor musun; kendi kanın bile bana diz çökmen için yalvarıyor. Boş yere direnmenin manası ne?”
